name: Pestis Apotheca: Plague Apothecary
description:
Do alchemy! Save lives! Wear a cool bird costume! Pay your rent!

Oh, and try not to let THE PLAGUE kill you.

Pestis Apotheca is a medieval medicine simulator, where you uncover treatments for procedural diseases, using procedural ingredients. If you find some good compounds, make sure to post them below to your fellow doctors!

Some info:

  • Still somewhat WIP, but definitely less than before!
  • The loading WebGL bar is not properly updating! Even if it seems stuck, it's loading, I promise (~150mb)
  • I shoehorned a software mouse pointer in there to circumvent WebGL issues. Let me know in the comments if something breaks horribly!
  • Use M and N to increase/decrease cursor sensitivity
  • If you're wondering what's up with the tower, you can find out here!

UI by @thia9uera (who has every right in wanting to kill me because I didn't polish it enough to do it justice!)

Uses Minions Art's Potion shader, some low-poly models by Polytope Studios and riffs on Ashen Victor's sci-fi portraits. Music by Incompetech.

Made for #procjam 2020, shamelessly submitted to #7dFPS
